attributes.action: make it an offence to deface, burn, desecrate, interfere or threaten to interfere with any part or display of ‘a union flag’.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would broadly include any union flag and include any part of the union flag, any representation of the union flag, and anything which anyone might immediately perceive as the union flag (i.e. a picture of the union flag). 

Outraging the union flag whether it is your own personal property or the property of others should be a crime even in the context of a protest. 

Even under the freedom of expression it should still be a crime to burn, destroy, desecrate, interfere or insult the union flag.

The union flag may not be desecrated neither by words, deeds or acts and this includes insulting the flag or the flag bearers.

The criminal act also includes interfering or threatening to interfere with the property supporting or displaying a union flag such as a building, window or flagpole etc.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
